deck: An original member of First Force.
description:
Origin

Largely unknown, Silver Man was one of the original members of First Force, alongside Meridian, Nephilim, The Projector and Warrior Woman.

Creation

Silver Man is a Boom! Studios published character that first appears in the 2012 series Deathmatch, appearing in its debut issue Deathmatch #1. Silver Man is designed and created by writer Paul Jenkins and artists Carlos Magno and Michael Garland, writers and artists of the series.
name: Silver Man

description: Hatched just seconds after Cragger, Crooler is the Crocodile Prince’s ambitious and conniving twin sister. She is constantly goading her brother on and forcing him to take all the risks, while she seeks to enjoy the rewards of his success or mock him relentlessly when he fails. Some creatures see her as the REAL authority in the Crocodile Tribe, which is fine with her. She’s happy to have the power, without any of the annoying trivialities and decision-making of official leadership. She doesn’t exactly want to overthrow Cragger as much as she wants to manipulate him for her own benefits. She is very good at pushing his buttons and pulling his strings. She knows all his weaknesses and insecurities, and constantly plays on them in order to accomplish her own goals and self-aggrandizement. She is truly the most cruel of all the Crocodiles.
name: Crooler

deck: Born in the slums of Chicago in the early 1900's. Billy Byrne or 'The Mucker' was a thug, a drunkard, a thief and and all round bad guy. Although he followed a strict code of 'street ethics'. A powerfully built man, a crafty brawler and a very gifted boxer. Byrne was lethal in a fight. He ultimately surpassed his less than noble predilections and evolved into quite a heroic character throughout his 'two fisted' pulp adventures.
name: The Mucker

deck: Guillaume Batiaque is a restauranteur in the era of the Grendel-Khan whose brother's murder starts a search for the reincarnation of Hunter Rose.
description:
Major Story Arcs

Four Devils, One Hell

Guillaume Batiaque hires the private detective Josef Mantovani to find his brother Emile's murderer. Guillaume is a fan of old noir stories and believes in the detective more than he does himself.

However, Mantovani soon finds himself embroiled in a complex scheme instigated by the head of the New Orleans Grendel krewe, Renute, to kill all the known descendants of Charlemagne, the ancient French king. Renute, who is a descendant of Charlemagne himself, has heard a voodoo prophecy that whoever is Charlemagne's heir on the 800th anniversary of Hunter Rose's death will become the reincarnation of Hunter Rose. The Batiaque family are Charlemagne's most direct heirs, and so Renute kills them all off, first Emile and then soon after, Guillaume.

Guillaume's cousin, Simone, and her unnamed boy, then become the official heirs. Mantovani and a group of Grendels eventually solve the mystery and kill Renute.
name: Guillaume Batiaque

volume_credits.name: Grendel Tales: Four Devils, One Hell
Grendel Tales: Four Devils, One Hell

deck: Radley Benton is a fearful curator for the New Orleans Grendel Krewe until his life is turned upside down.
description:
Major Story Arcs

Four Devils, One Hell

Radley Benton is a 33-year-old curator of antiquities for the New Orleans Grendel Krewe under their leader, Renute. He is socially anxious and a virgin, and essentially lives his life as a bump on a log.

Then one day a fellow Grendel curator from England, Gloria DeVere, meets him in a bar. She seduces him in order to find out about the artwork he oversees. She is in search of the long-lost Mona Lisa, and has tracked it to New Orleans. She doesn't really even like him, and just uses him for information. He, on the other hand, totally falls for her.

Gloria finally finds out where the Mona Lisa is being stored, but ends up in a climatic battle with many of the other figures in the area when she tries to get it back. Radley, meanwhile, has been turned into a vampire by Renute. He asks Gloria to join him as a vampire so they can be together forever. Gloria, however, doesn't hesitate to kill him immediately.
name: Radley Benton

volume_credits.name: Grendel Tales: Four Devils, One Hell
Grendel Tales: Four Devils, One Hell

deck: Lover to two Grendels and mother to the heir of Charlemagne.
description:
Major Story Arcs

Four Devils, One Hell

Simone, a joyful woman, marries Alfred Bixby, an insecure Grendel accountant. They are in love, but Alfred gets too deep into gambling, and loses her in a bet. In despair, Alfred has himself made pregnant, using the technology of the time, but the child soon dies as Alfred goes insane in the Amazon.

Calhoun, who won her from Bixby, is a smooth and mysterious Grendel. He falls in love with her, but despite his gambling skills, he also loses her in a bet to an unknown man.

She has an unnamed boy with this unknown man. The father becomes a vampire, and turns her into a vampire as well. She leaves him and goes off into the swamps to hide with her boy, whom she shockingly still loves and protects, despite the fact that he is still human.

Simone is part of the Batiaque family, the members of which are (unknown to them) direct descendants of Charlemagne, the ancient French king. Her cousin is Guillaume Batiaque. According to a voodoo prophecy, whoever is the most direct descendant of Charlemagne on the 800th anniversary of Hunter Rose's death will become the reincarnation of Hunter Rose. The leader of the New Orleans Grendel krewe, Renute, is also related to Charlemagne, and starts killing all the other descendents until only he and Simone and the boy are left. Then he sends his Grendel soldiers to get them.

Simone and the boy kill some of the Grendels, and are joined by Calhoun and his ally, Josef Mantovani. They kill the rest of the Grendels, but Simone is killed in the battle.

Mantovani and Calhoun take the boy under their protection, and eventually he is permanently adopted by Bixby. Renute is ultimately defeated; it is unclear whether the boy does become the reincarnation of Rose.
name: Simone Batiaque

volume_credits.name: Grendel Tales: Four Devils, One Hell
Grendel Tales: Four Devils, One Hell

deck: This unnamed boy is the son of Simone Batiaque and the possible reincarnation of Hunter Rose, the original Grendel.
description:
Major Story Arcs

Four Devils, One Hell

This young boy, whose name is unknown, is the son of Simone Batiaque. She was originally married to Alfred Bixby. Bixby loses her, through gambling, to a Grendel named Calhoun. Calhoun in turn loses her to another unknown man, once again through gambling. This unknown man apparently fathers the boy, and is later turned into a vampire. He then transforms Simone into a vampire.

Simone leaves the man and hides out in the swamps of the bayou with her boy--which is very unusual, since vampires usually do not have any sympathy for humans. It turns out that Simone and the boy are the last descendants of Charlemagne, the ancient French king. There is a prophecy that whoever is the closest descendant of Charlemagne on the 800th anniversary of Hunter Rose's death will become the reincarnation of Rose, the original Grendel. However, Renute, head of the local Grendel krewe, is also one of Charlemagne's descendants.

Renute sends some of his Grendels out to kill Simone and the boy, but they defend themselves well, and are joined by Josef Mantovani and Calhoun, who are working against Renute. Simone is killed in the battle, but Mantovani and Calhoun take charge of the boy.

Mantovani and the boy hide out in plain sight as Sylvester and Tweety during Mardi Gras, but are recognized anyway, and are captured with the help of Gloria DeVere.

Renute gathers them all together, and shows them the original skull of Hunter Rose. He reveals himself as a vampire, and explains that he actually hates everything about Grendel, and wants to destroy his heir and much of his riches. He plans to explode an atom bomb, taking the reincarnated Rose and all the krewe's treasure with him.

There is a great battle, and Renute and his krewe are killed, and the bomb is defused. The boy ends up back in the care of Alfred Bixby, Simone's first love, who takes him to the Amazon to learn to hunt vampires. It is unknown whether the boy does in fact become the reincarnation of Hunter Rose.

Abilities

Even at a young age, the boy is skilled at fighting, capable of killing multiple adult Grendels with a shotgun. He is later trained by Bixby to fight vampires using edged weapons.
name: Grendel Boy

volume_credits.name: Grendel Tales: Four Devils, One Hell
Grendel Tales: Four Devils, One Hell

aliases:
風間 蒼也
Sōya Kazama
name: Soya Kazama

deck: The newest student enrolled into the King’s Dominion High School for the Deadly Arts. He plans to assassinate U.S. President Ronald Reagan, who he blames for the sequence of events that led to his parents' deaths.
description:
Origin

As a child, Marcus witnessed his parents' deaths when Barbara Salinger, a mentally ill suicide jumper, jumped off a bridge right unto them. Barbara was released from hospital because of President Ronald Reagan's policies. He lived at a boy's home up until 1986, when he burned it down after years of being beaten and abused under the supervision of religious fanatics that utilized illegal child labor for personal wealth. Marcus crafted a bomb made from nails, needles and other various items found at his assigned work station that he learned from reading The Anarchist Cookbook. The explosion killed two guards that attempted to rush into his room and also his bunkmate, f***face. Using the guard's keys to escape his room and free the other orphans, he captured and caged the headmistress that was the source of all their pain. Satisfied with what he had accomplished, Marcus quickly left the orphanage although he had no plans when he had escaped.

Unknown to Marcus, f***face survived and went on a one man rampage, killing every other school attendant and the imprisoned headmistress. The effects of the massacre was blamed upon Marcus and left him a wanted teenager while f***face was presumed dead and a victim of his former bunkmate's escape. After the massacre and explosion, Marcus lived as a vagrant on the streets and jumped from place to place, sleeping under bridges and in poor homes. Under the watchful eye of Saya, he was quickly recruited into King's Dominion High School for the Deadly Arts, even though he had initially opposed the idea at first.

Marcus has enrolled into King's Dominion High School for the Deadly Arts, and already he has begun to make friends and enemies. Shortly after saving Shabnam from a beating by Russian student Viktor, and being shot down by Saya he is selected for an extra-special class, AP Black Arts, and receives his first assignment. His lab partner for the mission is Willie.
name: Marcus Lopez

volume_credits.name: Deadly Class: Kids of the Black Hole

description: Always riding either a Speedor or his Lion Attack vehicle, Lennox is generally regarded as a freewheeling guy out for a good time. True, he drives the Lion Attack vehicle like there’s no tomorrow, and anyone getting in the way of his rushing Speedor had better look out. But he has hidden depths, and actually knows just about everything there is to know about two and four wheeled vehicles. He might look like an easy mark to his enemies, but Lennox has a few surprises for them.
name: Lennox

description: Rizzo is a scruffy scavenger with ragged fur and an eye-patch, and prides himself on being “the bottom of the bottom feeders.” Even Ravens have a slight bit of dignity, but not Rizzo. He has proudly nicknamed himself the “Shah of Shamelessness".
name: Rizzo

description: A self-centered opportunist, Razar never does anything that doesn’t somehow benefit Razar. Be suspicious if he ever appears “generous” because he’s almost certainly working some kind of angle. At least he’s predictable – he will always do the most greedy and selfish thing possible. He has allied himself with Cragger not because of any philosophical sympathies, but because he saw it as the most profitable path to take. Every conflict has its spoils, and Razar has his eyes on snatching up as many of them as possible. Besides, Laval is too much of a “goody two-paws” for him. Will Razar ever see the error of his ways? It depends – is there any money in it? If so... maybe. Razar is a pure mercenary who will fight for the highest bidder... and then steal all their weapons when they’re not looking.
name: Razar

description: Razcal is the Raven tribe’s accountant. All Ravens steal, but not all of them count. That’s where Razcal comes in. He keeps track of everything the Ravens pilfer, and figures out its value (adjusting for inflation and other “market forces”). It’s important for the Ravens to get a sense of where they are in the continuum of crime. The Ravens derive a lot of status from their ability to steal early and often, so Razcal’s “official count” is often the barometer of success within the Tribe. Without him, they’d just be thieves. With him, they can be “Master Thieves.”
name: Razcal

description: Grand Thief Master of the Ravens, Rawzom is not above petty thievery when the mood strikes him. He’s slick and practiced – be sure to double-check your pockets if he gets anywhere near! In addition to his petty larceny, Rawzom has excellent eyesight, making him a perfect tracker from high above Chima.
name: Rawzom

description: Longtooth is an older foot soldier who refused to join the other elders as a tribal leader. He claims he loves the "action" of the front lines too much to leave it. The truth is: he loves TALKING about the action a lot more than actually pursuing it. He has way too many aches and pains to be a great hero, but he can be counted on for some fierce fighting... as long as his back doesn't give out in the process.
name: Longtooth

description: Wakz is a pack elder, extremely cunning and not afraid of throwing overwhelming force at an opponent, fair or not. Not many wolves survive to such a distinguished age, and Wakz has only managed it by being more cunning, more ferocious, and stronger than any of his opponents.
name: Wakz

description: Crominus is the Crocodile King and Cragger's father. His wife is Queen Crunket. A tough and fiercely-protective leader, Crominus could not stand the Lions but he always respected them. Unlike his son, Crominus ruled with logic and common sense, instead of emotion. He realized that fighting always hurts BOTH sides. He was by no means a pacifist, but he was definitely more pragmatic than his hot-headed son.
name: King Crominus

volume_credits.name: Blade of the Immortal: Raining Chaos
Blade of the Immortal: Beyond Good and Evil
Blade of the Immortal: Final Curtain

deck: The head scientist of Weapon Minus program who injected himself with a mix of Super Soldier serum and LSD.
description:
Brief History

Horace Littleton was a scientist for the Weapon Plus program in the 60's, and eventually developed a LSD/Super Soldier Serum hybrid. However, Littleton's project had lost funding as well as test subjects so, Littleton injected the serum into himself.

Powers and Abilities

Dr. Mindbubble gets his power from a bowler hat he wears which has a pipe that comes out the front. The pipe creates large bubbles which, when encapsulating the head of a person, causes them to enter a mind-altering state. It has been shown that the only way for a subject to escape the consciousness-altering mind bubble and pop it altogether, is to kill yourself in the dream state.
name: Dr. Mindbubble

description:
Creation

Mayor Chandrake was created by horror director and writer George A Romero and artist Alex Maleev for Empire of the Dead.
name: Mayor Chandrake

volume_credits.name: George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act One
George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act One
George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act Two
George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act Two
George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act Three
George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act Three
George Romero's Empire of the Dead

deck: New Young mutant.
name: Darla

aliases: Third of the Four Who Rule
deck: Ruler of water and one of the Deathwalkers.
name: Lichidus

volume_credits.name: Mighty Avengers: Original Sin - Not Your Father's Avengers
Capitán América y Los Poderosos Vengadores

deck: Dead End is the sociopathic villain and protagonist from the Bad Ass series
description:
Powers and Abilities

  • Impossible Accuracy: Dead End possesses incredible accuracy with almost any kind of object.
  • Hand To Hand: Dead End is an accomplished hand to hand fighter but favors ranged combat.
  • Agility: Dead End has displayed incredible agility
  • Super Luck : All of Dead End's capabilities come from his incredible luck.
name: Dead End

description:
Bates is a Sargent in the US army, he's head of security of Atlantis in the Pegasus Galaxy. He's captured by the Wraith together with Colonel Marshall Sumner in the first episode of Stargate Atlantis.

He manages to escape the Wraith Queen and the Wraith Hive Ship with the help of John Sheppard and Aiden Ford. He lives by military code and doesn't overstep boundaries. He's hard on everyone and always does what he thinks is right. He has few real friends on Atlantis.
name: Sergeant Bates

deck: A parody of serial killer Dexter Morgan who kills other killers.
name: Baxter

deck: Contestant in the Ninth Annual Equestria Super Chef contest from Gallopvania who is a food performance artist.
name: Marine Sandwich

volume_credits.name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Friendship

deck: Contestant in the Ninth Annual Equestria Super Chef contest who is from Dodge City. Her desire to win the contest is too use the prize money to reopen the restaurant the "Cherry Pit"
name: Toffee Truffle

volume_credits.name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Friendship

deck: Contestant in the Ninth Annual Equestria Super Chef contest from Las Pegasus.
name: Blade Sparxx

volume_credits.name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Friendship

deck: Contestant in the Ninth Annual Equestria Super Chef contest who is from Manehattan.
name: Summer Van Der Hoof

volume_credits.name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Friendship

deck: Nate Graft is the co-founder and CEO of YourLife, a social networking company and website.
name: Nate Graft

deck: Edwin Hiccox is the co-founder and CIO of YourLife, a social networking company and website.
name: Ed Hiccox

deck: Psychic aunt of Veronica Lodge.
name: Aunt Lily

description:
Cowen led the Atlantis Away Team to believe that all Genii were an Amish like people. He was hesitant to trade food with them, but changed his mind after seeing C-4 clear away a tree stump. After Sheppard clears it with Dr. Weir they return to the Genii Homeworld with C4 and medical supplies.

Dr. McKay detects a weak radiation signal and follows it to a hatch that leads to an underground bunker. After they're detained by a heavily armed Genii military team Cowen enters the room dressed as a high ranking Genii military officer.

He explains that the Genii hide underground from the Wraith. As long as they don't know they've developed and grown as a people they are mostly left alone. The food they grow above ground is only just enough for the people living underground. They want to fight the Wraith and are in the process of building a nuclear bomb. But many scientists are killed by the radiation poisoning. John Sheppard offers to help them infiltrate a Hive Ship with a Puddle jumper and Dr. Rodney McKay helps them perfect the nuclear bomb.

After the mission, where they lose one Genii called Tyrus, Cowan turns against the Atlantis team and surrounds them in order to take their weapons and the puddle jumper. Unfortunately for him John Sheppard expected this move and decloacks two puddle jumpers after which Cowen stands down.

He later ordered Commander Acastus Kolya to invade Atlantis during a storm to retrieve the Wraith data storage device they stole during the first expedition and a load of C-4. Kolya eventually loses and returns to the Genii home world.

Cowan is later overthrown as Genii leader by Ladon Radim who plans and executes a coup against him. Cowen dies in the blast of a Genii A-bomb.
name: Cowen

aliases:
ユキノ・アグリア
Yukino Agria
deck: The Celestial Spirit Mage who is a member of Sabertooth. She is the younger sister of Sorano Aguria. During the Grand Magic Games, Yukino was kicked out of Sabertooth by Jiemma for losing her match against Kagura and was not a part of any guild at the end. Mermaid Heel, Lamia Scale, Blue Pegasus, Sabertooth, and even Fairy Tail all wanted her to join their respective guilds, but Yukino decided to stay with Sabertooth due to Sting taking over the role of Guild Master.
name: Yukino Aguria

deck: Pro golfer.
name: Hanabusa

Kudō Rei
玖堂 レイ
name: Kudou Rei

Harley Quinn and Her Gang of Harleys

description: Chuck is, like Dr. Rodney McKay, a Canadian member of the Atlantis Expedition into the Pegasus Galaxy. He works as a technician on the Atlantis' Control Room and took over the duties of running the Stargate itself after Dr. Peter Grodin died.
name: Chuck the Technician

deck: Bernie is a taxidermied beaver who serves as a kind of sidekick to Harley Quinn.  Half of him is burnt and charred, supposedly due to an incident with the Joker.  He talks, but Harley Quinn is the only one able to hear him.
description:
Origin

Bernie is a taxidermy beaver who Harley Quinn finds in her storage locker. After Joker blows up the locker, Harley takes Bernie with her to Coney Island. Where he becomes her new best friend, that Harley can only hear.

Major Story Arc

Future End

For more information see: Futures End

Five years later, Harley takes Bernie with her on vacation, and he is there when the plane she's on blows up. Bernie is then eating by a shark, and all Harley finds of Bernie is his skull. She carries the skull around while on an island full of natives who believe Harley to be a goddess, but when Harley plans on marrying the Joker, Bernie protests. This causes Harley to throw his skull into a pit of alligators. This seems like the end of Bernie, but the beaver makes a return as Harley plans on leaving the island, when Harley stumbles over the corpse of a alligator.

issue_credits.name: Undercover Punker Part 1: Eat To This Beat!
Die Laughing Part Three: Goin' For Takeout
Die Laughing Part Two: The Coney Island of the Damned
A New Day, A New Fray

Harley Quinn: A Call To Arms

deck: One of the students at the King’s Dominion School of the Deadly Arts.
description:
Current Events

Willie's father was a respected gangster, who was shot before his son's eyes in his own house. Afraid, Willie froze and shot his pants. His uncle Russ came in and shot the gangsters. He gave Willie the gun, so when others showed up, it looked like Willie had killed them. This gave him a reputation.

At the King’s Dominion School of the Deadly Arts, Willie is the leader of the F.W.O. (Final World Order), a clique of students from South Central Los Angeles.

Major Story Arcs

Willie is Marcus' lab partner for their AP Black Arts class assignment.
name: Willie Lewis

volume_credits.name: Deadly Class: Kids of the Black Hole

deck: A student at the King’s Dominion School of the Deadly Arts who often dons Mexican style skull face paint. She was a love interest of Marcus Lopez and was recently killed via poison ingestion.
description: Born in Mexico to a poverty stricken family, she was raised by her parents as they struggled to make meets end under a vicious Cartel Lord. Upon finding out that Maria's father was attempting to earn extra money without his permission, he personally murdered the majority of the family with a trio of henchmen to include his son, Chico. Ready to slaughter Maria, his hand was stayed by Chico as he stated that she could possible become a strong ally as she was clever and cunning. In agreement with his son, the cartel lord adopted her into his own family and raised her along his son. Years had passed and she becomes a student at King's Dominion School of The Deadly Arts and earns praise for her indirect tactics. Eventually,s he falls for Marcus Lopez, despite already being romantically involved with the son of the man who murdered her family, Chico. While stalking the duo among their group of friends, he confronts the two while they had been laying in bed and he attacks Marcus. Maria kills Chico to protect Marcus without remorse. She is later killed by Master Lin when he discovers the mayhem being caused and the part she had played.

issue_credits.name: Ballad of Marcus & Maria: A Prologue

name: Maria

volume_credits.name: Deadly Class: Kids of the Black Hole

deck: A student and leader of the Kuroki Syndicate at the King’s Dominion School of the Deadly Arts, who advocates for Marcus Lopez's admission, becoming responsible for him and his actions to a degree.
description:
History

Saya watched Marcus for months upon behalf of King's Dominion Atelier of the Deadly Arts. Saya convinced Marcus to join and was his first mentor. While Marcus clearly had an infatuation with Saya, he ended up dating Saya's closest friend Maria. Maria worried about Marcuses desire to be with Saya, and aggressively deterred her from pursuing a relationship. While out partying, they had a deadly encounter with Chico, Maria's boyfriend who recently discovered Marcus was hooking up with Maria. The altercation ended with Chico being beheaded and his head be taken by F-Face, an old enemy of Marcus.

Later, Saya slept with Marcus after a night of partying.She also tracked down F-face and they group attacked the house to retrieve Chico's head. However, Maria almost let Saya die during the raid as she had discovered her love affair with Marcus. Saya barely escaped with her life and soon saw Maria making out with Marcus back at school.

Two months after Maria disappears, Saya is approached by Marcus and is told he loves her. However, she callously rejected him and told him she's with his friend Willie now. Marcus continued his emotional breakdown and began wondering what if Maria had been killed by Saya.

Marcus began to push Saya and when he questioned her honor, she punched him in retaliation. Saya distanced herself from Marcus and her and Willie continued to watch Marcus from the shadows. Angered by this, Marcus told Willie's crew the Final World Order, that Willie's reputation was a lie. Marcus expected the crew to kill Willie but instead found a member of the crew dead and tied to the flag poll, likely displayed as a message from Willie and Saya.

Master Lin soon declared that their final exam was to kill all the rats, those that have disobeyed the school's rules. Saya and Willie were not declared rats and attempted to help Billy who was declared one. When given the choice, Billy left to be with Marcus and Petra who ran from their classmates as it was safer to be with his own kind, the rats, then to be with Saya and Willie who wanted to help him.

Saya and Willie ran as they were pursued by the Final World Order. They were eventually cornered in the library and Saya promised to protect him. She knew he wouldn't be much help and Willie finally told her the true story. His uncle didn't save him from the gang when he was a small boy. When the gang broke into his home, Willie grabbed a gun and accidentally shot his dad in the head and killed him. He was too afraid to use a gun ever since. Saya understood and turned to protect him. When she got knocked down, she was about to be killed but Willie worked up the nerve to save her by killing his old gang members before they could harm her. As Willie helped her up, he called her out and said she was quick enough to have grabber her sword and saved herself. He knew she had done it to help break him of his fear. They were, however, suddenly interrupted and called into Master Lin's office. There, they were given their next assignment, to kill Marcus for his betrayal to the school or face public humiliation to their own gang's for their failures to kill him. Saya was also warned that she was responsible for Marcus as she had agreed to be his sponsor when he first joined the school.
name: Saya

volume_credits.name: Deadly Class: Kids of the Black Hole
